quote: It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: Happiness can be found, even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: Fear of a name increases fear of the thing itself.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: The truth. It is a beautiful and terrible thing, and should therefore be treated with great caution.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: It matters not what someone is born, but what they grow to be.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: We are only as strong as we are united, as weak as we are divided.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: Numbing the pain for a while will make it worse when you finally feel it.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: The ones that love us never really leave us.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: Differences of habit and language are nothing at all if our aims are identical and our hearts are open.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: Indifference and neglect often do much more damage than outright dislike.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: The world isn’t split into good people and Death Eaters.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: Understanding is the first step to acceptance, and only with acceptance can there be recovery.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: We’ve all got both light and dark inside us. What matters is the part we choose to act on. That’s who we really are.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: Do not pity the dead, Harry. Pity the living, and above all, those who live without love.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: Dumbledore would have been happier than anybody to think that there was a little more love in the world.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: It is impossible to live without failing at something, unless you live so cautiously that you might as well not have lived at all.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: I do believe something very magical can happen when you read a good book.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: Rock bottom became the solid foundation on which I rebuilt my life.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: We do not need magic to transform our world. We carry all the power we need inside ourselves already.
author: J.K. Rowling
